title: Immolate
description: Burns the target for [~50% Spell Power] fire damage each turn.

title: Fireblast
description: Hurls a bolt of fire dealing [~150% Spell Power] fire damage to a single target.

title: Fire Shield
description: Wreaths the target in flame granting 10% Fire Resistance. Attackers take [~15% Spell Power] fire damage.

title: Burning Reach
description: Increases the range of all non-melee abilities by 1 hex.

title: Fire Borne
description: Increases Fire Resistance by 10%.

title: Hot Head I
description: Increases all damage and healing by 8%.

title: Burning Ground
description: Ignite an area in flames. Enemies take [~50% Spell Power] fire damage each turn they remain on burning ground.
notes: This damage also occurs upon re-entering the area if the enemy had left it previously.

title: Enchant Fire
description: Enchants the target's weapon to add [20% Spell Power] fire damage to attacks.

title: Fireball
description: Hurls a ball of flame dealing [~110% Spell Power] fire damage to all targets in range.

title: Cauterize
description: Removes all negative statuses from friendly target but inflicts 10% of target's Maximum Health as fire damage.

title: Fire Starter
description: All enemies now start the battle with 4 stacks of Heat.

title: Hot Head II
description: Increases damage and healing by an additional 12%.
notes: This bonus adds to Hot Head I, for a total of 20% increased damage and healing.

title: Rune of Exploding
description: Place a rune on the selected hex. After 1 turn, it detonates dealing [~200% Spell Power] fire damage to all enemies within 1 hex.

title: Aura of Flame
description: Continually deals [~40% Spell Power] fire damage to all enemies within 3 hexes of your character.
notes: If an enemy leaves then re-enters this area, they will take the damage again. Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Haste
description: Target gains an additional action this turn. Applies Exhaustion.
notes: Can be cast on summoned creatures, but does not grant them an additional action. This simply adds 1 to how many action points are available for the target, thus it can stack.

title: Detonate
description: Deals [~160% Spell Power] fire damage to all foes within 2 hexes of your character.

title: Kindling
description: Gain an additional action the first turn of battle. Applies Exhaustion.
notes: This only occurs once in arena fights.

title: Fuel for the Flames I
description: Increase the mana cost of all skills by 20% and increase the effectiveness of mana using skills by 40%.

title: Lasting Flame
description: Heat lasts 2 additional turns.
notes: Heat lasts 5 turns instead of 3.

title: Fissure
description: Open the earth in a line spawning deadly fissures that deal [~200% Spell Power] fire damage.
notes: The line is 5 hexes long, and 3 hexes wide.

title: Overwhelming Power
description: Increase the damage of your next damaging action by 100%.
notes: This bonus adds to effects like Hot Head 1 and 2, thus it does not double your damage unless it is the only Generic Damage Modifier active. Lasts until used.

title: Meteor
description: Call down a ball of fire to smash your enemies. Deals [~100% Spell Power] fire damage within 2 hexes. Fire remains on the impacted area dealing [~60% Spell Power] fire damage per turn.
notes: Each targets heat stacks only increase the damage for that one target, not all caught within the blast.

title: Flash Fire
description: Reduces the cooldown of all fire skills by 1.
notes: This stacks with other cooldown reductions that are applicable, but no skill can be reduced below a 1 turn cooldown.

title: Fuel for the Flames II
description: Increase the mana cost of all skills by 30% and increase the effectiveness of mana using skills by 60%.
notes: This bonus adds to Fuel for the Flames I, for a total of 50% increased mana costs, and 100% increased effect.

title: Fever
description: Mana costs are now paid in Health instead.

title: Fire Storm
description: Hurls fireballs at 3 different targets dealing [~110% Spell Power] fire damage within 2 hexes of each target.

title: Mass Haste
description: All allies gain an additional action this turn. Applies Exhaustion.

title: Meteor Shower
description: Summon a rain of meteors to bombard enemies within 4 hexes of the target location. Deals [~70% Spell Power] fire damage 3 times.

title: Fickle Flame
description: Each time a damage or healing skill is cast, it receives a random effectiveness modifier from 50% up to 250%.
notes: This overall boosts damage more than it lowers it, as it is more likely to get a value from 100%-250% than from 50%-99%. The value from this does adjust tooltips, but it is randomized after casting, thus can not be manipulated via reading the ability descriptions. Does not apply to Purge Mana, as that is not damage or healing.

title: Avatar of Flame
description: Each stack of Heat now applies [20% Spell Power] fire damage to the target per turn.

title: Lightning Shield
description: Increases Lightning Resistance by 10%. Attackers take [~15% Spell Power] lightning damage.

title: Shock
description: Reaches out and shocks the target dealing [~60% Spell Power] lightning damage. Applies Disabled to the target.

title: Dazzling Darts
description: Shoots 3 darts of electricity each dealing [~40% Spell Power] as lightning damage.

title: Storm Weathered I
description: Increases all Elemental Resistances by 5%.

title: Stormbringer I
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 5%.

title: Thunder Borne
description: Increases Lightning Resistance by 10%.

title: Enchant Lightning
description: Enchants the target's weapon to add [20% Spell Power] lightning damage to attacks.

title: Twister
description: Summons a raging tempest that deals [~120% Spell Power] lightning damage in a line. Targets hit are Crippled for 2 turns.
notes: The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Discharge
description: Deals [~90% Spell Power] lightning damage within 3 hexes of the caster.

title: Teleport Self
description: Teleports the caster to the target location in a flash of lightning. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Storm Weathered II
description: Increases all Elemental Resistances by an additional 8%.
notes: This bonus adds to Storm Weathered 1 for a total of 13% Elemental Resistances.

title: Stormbringer II
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by an additional 8%.
notes: This bonus adds to Stormbringer 1 for a total of 13% increase to Critical Hit chance.

title: Gathering Storm
description: Increases Maximum Mana by 20%.

title: Aura of Lightning
description: Each time an action is made by an enemy within the aura they suffer [~40% Spell Power] lightning damage.
notes: Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Teleport Other
description: Teleports the target to the location of your choosing in a flash of lightning. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Thunder Bolt
description: Summon lightning from the sky to strike an area dealing [~110% Spell Power] lightning damage.

title: Chain Lightning
description: Conjures a lightning bolt that chains up to 5 enemies near the target dealing [~80% Spell Power] lightning damage to each target.

title: Storm Brewing
description: Each stack of Shocked you've applied increases your Critical Hit Chance by 1%.

title: Energy Shield
description: 90% of the damage taken is lost in mana instead of health.

title: Static Field
description: Averages all the current health percentages of targets within 3 hexes and redistributes them to be even.

title: Overload
description: Gives the target 100% Critical Hit Chance for 1 turn.

title: Shocking Shackles
description: Deals [200% Spell Power] lightning damage. Applies Stunned.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Thunder Storm
description: Summon a thunderstorm over a large area that deals [90% Spell Power] lightning damage every turn to enemies with it's range.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Heavy Rains
description: Each point of Intelligence now grants 0.1% Critical Hit Chance and 1% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Recharge
description: You have a 33% chance to completely refund the mana cost spent while using abilities. When mana is refunded this way, a random ability will have its cooldown lowered by 1.

title: Energy Cannon
description: Deals [~20% Spell Power] lightning damage in a 6 hex line 10 times.
notes: The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Thunder Wrath
description: Summons 4 thunder bolts targeting enemies at random within a 10 hex radius. Each bolt deals [100% Spell Power] lightning damage to foes within 3 hexes of its blast.
notes: This ability has no damage range and thus always does the same damage.

title: Conduit
description: Gains an additional action each turn.

title: Thunder Struck
description: Your lightning damage has a 10% chance to conjure a thunderbolt on a random enemy dealing [~110% Spell Power] lightning damage within 2 hexes of its blast.

title: Freeze Earth
description: Freezes the ground in the target area applying 1 stack of Chilled to enemies that enter.

title: Frost Armor
description: Envelopes the caster in frost granting 10% Cold Resistance. Attackers take [~15% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Chilling Strike
description: The caster's hand becomes imbued with frost thrusting it at the target dealing [~150% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frost Shard
description: Impale your target on a shard of ice dealing [~130% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frostbite I
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the target's damage by 2%.

title: Crystalize I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Frost Borne
description: Increases Cold Resistance by 10%.

title: Deep Freeze
description: Intense frost encircles your foe applying 5 stacks of Chilled on the target.
notes: This effectively freezes the target instantly, since 5 stacks of Chilled will apply Frozen.

title: Enchant Cold
description: Enchants the target's weapon to add [20% Spell Power] cold damage to attacks.

title: Ice Lance
description: The caster hurls a razor-like shard of ice piercing foes in a line dealing [~120% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frost Nova
description: The caster creates a wave of frozen energy dealing [~100% Spell Power] cold damage within 2 hexes of the selected target.

title: Frostbite II
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the target's damage by an additional 3%.
notes: This bonus adds to Frostbite I for a total of 5% damage reduction.

title: Crystalize II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10%.
notes: This bonus adds to Crystalize I for a total of 15% Physical Resistance.

title: Break the Ice
description: The first time you deal damaging or healing in battle, its effectiveness is increased by 100%.

title: Aura of Frost
description: Deals [~40% Spell Power] cold damage to enemies that start their turns within 3 hexes of your character.
notes: Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Breath of Winter
description: Conjures the breath of a frost dragon dealing [~160% Spell Power] cold damage to all enemies in a cone.

title: Ice Wall
description: Summon pillars of ice to block 4 hexes blocking enemy line of sight. Attackers take cold damage. Lasts 4 turns.

title: Frozen Spikes
description: Hurl 5 shards of ice dealing [~20% Spell Power] cold damage to each target.

title: Cold Blooded
description: Each stack of Chilled you've applied increases your cold damage by 5%.

title: Diamond Ice
description: 1% of your Armor value is added to your character as Additional Cold Damage

title: Brain Freeze
description: Deals [100% Spell Power] cold damage each time the target performs an action.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Ice Storm
description: Conjure a massive ice storm dealing [90% Spell Power] cold damage to affected enemies each turn.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Stasis
description: Encases the friendly target in a dome of ice granting [15 per character level] Armor and Magic Armor for the duration. Immobilizes the target.

title: Frozen Core
description: Each stack of Chilled now reduces the target's Maximum Health by 5%.

title: Invulnerable Winter
description: Intelligence grants [1.1 - 5 based on character level] Armor and Magic Armor per point.

title: Shatter
description: Summons a blast of frozen energy dealing [~70% Spell Power] cold damage plus an additional [~70% Spell Power] per stack of Chilled on targets in a 4 hex radius.

title: Chain Frost
description: Deals [~50% Spell Power] cold damage. Bounces between enemies within 4 hexes up to 10 times.

title: Mass Freeze
description: Applies Frozen to all enemies.

title: Master of Ice
description: Each turn you freeze an enemy, you gain an additional action.

title: Icefall
description: When enemies are frozen by you they release a Frost Nova.

title: Fracture
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Lowers target's Resistance by 20% for 2 turns.

title: Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Max Life by 15%. Increases Damage Received by 15%.

title: Bash
description: Deals [~120% Attack Power] weapon damage. Knocks the target back up to 3 hexes.

title: Double Edge
description: Deal [~180% Attack Power] weapon damage to the target and 15% of the damage back to you.

title: Wanderer
description: Increases Movement Points by 1.

title: Warmonger I
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by 8%.

title: Guardian I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Challenger
description: For every enemy within 1 hex of your character gain 5% Armor and Magic Armor.

title: Charge
description: Charges the target and deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Mortal Fracture
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage and lowers target's Resistance by 20% and Healing received by 50% for 2 turns.

title: Dispelling Fracture
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage, removes 1 random beneficial status from the target and lowers the target's Resistance by 20% for 2 turns.

title: Tempered Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt, Armor, and Magic Armor by 15%.

title: Beserker's Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Damage Received by 25%. Increases Max Life by 15%.

title: Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Bloodlet
description: Sacrifice 15% of your maximum health in exchange for an additional action this turn. Applies Exhaustion.

title: Opportunist
description: Increases damage of Opportunity Attacks and Counter Attacks by 25%.

title: Warmonger II
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by an additional 12%.
notes: This bonus adds to Warmonger I for a total of 20% increased damage and healing.

title: Guardian II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10%.
notes: This bonus adds to Guardian I for a total of 15% Physical Resistance.

title: Into the Fray
description: For every enemy within 3 hexes of your character gain 3% Increased Damage and 3% Maximum Health.

title: Slam
description: Deals [~160% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within a line.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Warrior's Boon
description: Heals 25% of your maximum health and removes all negative statuses.

title: Howl
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] physical damage. Enemies within 2 hexes deal 20% less damage for 2 turns.

title: Bleeding Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 2 stacks of Bleeding on all targets hit.

title: Life Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage. Life steals for 10% per target.

title: Furious George
description: 1% of your Armor value is added to your character as Additional Weapon Damage.

title: Shield Mastery
description: Increases All Stats from shields by 50%.

title: Two-Handed Mastery
description: While a two-handed weapon is equipped, all damage is increased by 20%.

title: Dual Wield Mastery
description: While dual wielding Dodge Chance increased by 5%, Critical Hit Chance increased by 5% and Critical Hit Damage increased by 20%.

title: Beserker's Blood
description: For every 1% of health missing, gain 1% Increased Damage.

title: Stunning Slam
description: Deals [~180% Attack Power] physical damage and applies Stunned to all enemies within a line for 1 turn.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Crushing Slam
description: Deals [~240% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within a line.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Vitality Break
description: Consumes 50% of your Current Health to deal [50% of Current Health * Might modifier] weapon damage. Damage is increased by how much health is consumed.

title: Bone Collector
description: Every enemy that dies grants 6% Maximum Health and Increased Damage. Lasts the duration of the battle. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Blood Drinker
description: Increases the basic attack damage by 50%. Basic attacks now Life Steal for 5%.

title: Executioner
description: Every enemy that dies grants 1 additional AP. Can only grant up to 1 additional AP per turn.

title: Unyielding Contender
description: Grants 50% Armor, Magic Armor, and Max Health for 2 turns. Grants Enrage. Usable while stunned.

title: Sunder
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Ignores all armor and resists. Cannot be dodged. Life Steals for 25%.

title: Colossus
description: Damage you deal splashes to enemies within 1 hex for 50% of the damage dealt.

title: Indestructible
description: Getting hit increases Armor, Magic Armor, and Return Damage by 10% per stack. Stacks 10 times.

title: Healing Hand
description: The caster reaches out in aid, healing 30% of target's Maximum Health.

title: Elemental Protection
description: Increases target's Elemental Resistance by 15%.

title: Regenerate
description: Target restores [~50% Spell Power] health per turn.

title: Cure
description: Restores target's health by [~150% Spell Power].

title: Blessed by Light I
description: Mana costs reduced by 10%.

title: Empowered Light I
description: Increases Holy Power and Healing Received by 10%.

title: Seal of Protection
description: Decreases damage taken by 10% for you and allies within 3 hexes.
notes: Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.

title: Blinding Light
description: Summons a radiant light applying Blind to the target and dealing [~80% Spell Power] Holy damage.

title: Shield of Light
description: Calls down a shield that protects the target absorbing [~130% Spell Power] damage.
notes: Shields gain increased power from boosted healing, even though they are not directly healing.

title: Bless
description: Bless all allies within 5 hexes. Increases Damage, Maximum Health and Maximum Mana by 10%.

title: Blessed by Light II
description: Mana costs reduced by an additional 15%.
notes: This bonus adds to Blessed by Light I for a total reduction of 25%.

title: Empowered Light II
description: Increases the effectiveness of all healing given and received by 15%.
notes: This bonus adds to Empowered Light for a total of 25% extra healing.

title: Glory
description: The first time you receive fatal damage in battle you are revived with 1 health and become immune to all damage for 1 turn.

title: Kindred Spirit
description: All healing you do to others also heals you for 20% of the amount healed.

title: Seal of Might
description: Increases the damage of all allies within 3 hexes by 30%.
notes: Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.

title: Purify
description: Removes all negative statuses from the target. Can be used when Disabled.

title: Mass Cure
description: Restores [~180% Spell Power] health to all allies within 2 hexes of the target.

title: Light's Beckon
description: Teleport target ally within 3 hexes of your character.

title: Light's Endurance
description: Increases Vitality by 20%.

title: Light's Strength
description: Increases Might by 20%.

title: Light's Brilliance
description: Increases Intelligence by 20%.

title: Light's Celerity
description: Increases Dexterity by 20%.

title: Shield of Retribution
description: Conjures a shield imbued with holy flame absorbing [200% Spell Power] damage. Upon shield depletion, it explodes and deals [200% Spell Power] fire damage to all foes in a 3 hex radius.
notes: Lasts for 3 turns or until depleted. Both the damage and healing values scale off of healing increases and damage increases. Does not explode if the duration runs out, only if it is broken by damage.

title: Holy Ground
description: Consecrate an area of ground to heal allies that stand upon it. Heals [~75% Spell Power] per turn for 3 turns.

title: Divine Intervention
description: Restores the target to full health.

title: Lingering Light
description: Any target you heal also receives an additional healing over time effect restoring [~40% Spell Power] health for 3 turns.

title: Quickening
description: Every time one of your Light skills is cast on an ally, one of the ally's spells has it's cooldown lowered by 1 turn. This effect can only happen once per turn.

title: The Good Doctor
description: Reduces the cooldown of all Light spells by 1.

title: Seal of Salvation
description: All allies within 3 hexes of you heal for [100% Spell Power] per turn. Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.

title: Ascendancy
description: Increases the target ally's stats by 40%.

title: Redemption
description: Redeem the soul of the first character to die in your party. The target's health and mana are fully restored. Does not affect summoned creatures.

title: Salvation
description: Your beneficial Light spells now apply Salvation. Lasts 3 turns.

title: Wrath of the Righteous
description: Healing skills in the Light tree can now deal damage to enemies as well as heal allies.

title: Tracker's Mark
description: Gain 15% Increased Damage and 8% Critical Hit Chance on the target. If the target dies while Tracker's Mark is active, the cooldown is reset.

title: Crippling Shot
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Slow.

title: Tranquilizing Shot
description: Tranquilizes the target applying Sleep for 2 turns.

title: Rally
description: Increases movement of all allies within 4 hexes by 3.

title: Eagle Eye
description: Increase the range of all ranged skills by 1 hex.

title: Survivalist I
description: Increases All Resistances and Dodge Chance by 3%.

title: Huntsman I
description: Physical damage increased by [1.2 - 24 based on character level].

title: Bounty Hunter's Mark
description: Gains 15% Increased Damage and 8% Critical Hit Chance against the target. If the target dies while Bounty Hunter's Mark is active, all cooldowns are reduced by 1.

title: Stalker's Mark
description: Gain 25% Increased Damage and 12% Critical Hit Chance against the target. If the target dies while Stalker's Mark is active, the cooldwon is reset.

title: Bleeding Shot
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 2 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Pinning Shot
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Immobilized.

title: Relocate
description: Jump to the target area. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Precision I
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 4% and Critical Hit Damage by 16%.

title: Survivalist II
description: Increases All Resistances and Dodge Chance by and additional 5%.
notes: This bonus adds to Survivalist I for a total of of 8%.

title: Huntsman II
description: Physical damage increased by [1.8 - 36 based on character level].
notes: This bonus adds to Huntsman I for a total of 60 increased physical damage at level 30.

title: Disengage
description: You can move 1 additional hex each turn and no longer take opportunity attacks.

title: Long Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Every hex between you and your target increases the damage by 10%.

title: Blasting Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage to all targets in area. Targets are knocked back 3 hexes.

title: Volley
description: Shoot up to 3 enemies near the target area dealing [~160% Attack Power] weapon damage per target. The arrow can chain to targes within 3 hexes of the last target hit.

title: Precision II
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by an additional 6% and Critical Hit Damage by an additional 24%.
notes: This bonus adds to Precision I for a total of +10% Chance and +40% Damage

title: Patient Hunter
description: Patient Hunter gives 10% Increased Damage and 1 Skill Range per stack. A stack is applied at the end of each turn. Making any movement removes all stacks of Patient Hunter. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Quick Hands
description: Your basic attack has a 50% chance to strike twice. Can only trigger once per turn.

title: Ranger's Gift I
description: Every hex between you and your target increases damage dealt by 2%.

title: Piercing Shot
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage in a line.

title: Sniper Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Every hex between you and your target increases the damage by 15%.

title: Called Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Every hex between you and your target increases the damage by 10%.  Called Shot cannot be dodged or blocked.

title: Quick Draw
description: Your next 3 basic attacks have no AP cost. Applies Exhaustion.
notes: Lasts until used.

title: Dispelling Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Removes 1 random beneficial status from the target.

title: Take Cover
description: Damage you take from enemies further than 2 hexes away from you is reduced by 35%.

title: Endless Quiver
description: Reduces all Ranger cooldowns by 1.

title: Ranger's Gift II
description: Every hex between you and your target increases damage dealt by an additional 3%.
notes: This bonus adds to Ranger's Gift I for a total of 5% per hex.

title: Branching Shot
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Bounces to enemies within 3 hexes. Each bounce increases its damage by 50%.

title: Force Shot
description: Deals [~300% Attack Power] weapon damage in a line and knocks targets back up to 4 hexes. Any enemy hit by the target also receives [~300% Attack Power] damage.

title: Cupid Shot
description: Charm the enemy target for 1 turn. Cannot target bosses.

title: Slaying Shot
description: Deals [400% Attack Power] weapon damage. Ignores all armor and resists. Cannot be dodged.

title: Mythic Reach
description: All ranged abilities get an additional 5 hex range.

title: Marked Prey
description: Attacks now apply Marked Prey. Marked Prey lasts 1 turn and new stacks refresh the duration of all existing stacks. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Raise Skeletal Archer
description: Summon a skeletal archer to fight by your side.

title: Ghost Armor
description: Completely negates the next attack. Lasts until hit.

title: Tainted Touch
description: Reaches out to the target with dark energy dealing [~120% Spell Power] shadow damage. Life Steals for 12%.

title: Blind
description: Deals [~110% Spell Power] shadow damage. Applies Blind for 1 turn.

title: Call of the Grave
description: Deal 20% additional damage to enemies below 50% health.

title: Necromancer I
description: Summons deal 10% more damage and have 10% more health.

title: Curse
description: Curses the target lowering All Resistances by 20% and Healing Received by 50%.

title: Haunt
description: Deals [~50% Spell Power] shadow damage to the target every turn for 3 turns. Life Steals for 6%.

title: Spectral Chains
description: Deals [~70% Spell Power] shadow damage and applies Immobilized for 1 turn.

title: Poison Cloud
description: The caster creates a poison gas cloud that applies 4 stacks of Poisoned within 2 hexes of the selected target.

title: Thirst I
description: Increase Life Steal by 4%.

title: Dark Pact
description: Increases the effectiveness of your damage and healing skills by 30%. Maximum Health reduced by 20%.

title: Vengeful Shadows
description: Grants [2 - 24 based on character level] Return Shadow Damage.

title: Necromancer II
description: Summons deal an additional 15% more damage and have an additional 15% more health.
notes: This bonus adds to Necromaner I for a total of 25% health and damage.

title: Raise Skeletal Warrior
description: Summons a skeletal warrior to fight by your side.

title: Mana Drain
description: Removes 20% of the target's max mana and restores 20% of the caster's max mana.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and always steals the same exact amount.

title: Consumption
description: Devour the life force of all enemies within 2 hexes dealing [~70% Spell Power] shadow damage and giving you 10% Maximum Health for each enemy affected.

title: Soul Crush
description: Crush the target's soul dealing [20% Max Health * Might modifier] shadow damage increased by your Max Health.

title: Thirst II
description: Increases Life Steal by 6%.
notes: This bonus adds to Thirst I for a total of 10% Life Steal.

title: Reaper's Toll
description: Every enemy that dies heals you for 10% of your Maximum Health.

title: Hunger
description: Grants 10% Mana Steal, sacrifices 10% Maximum Health per turn.

title: Vampiric Aura
description: Allies within Vampiric Aura Life Steal for 5%.
notes: Lasts until removed or insufficient mana.

title: Dark Ritual
description: Target cannot drop below 1 health while active.

title: Exorcism
description: Deals [~100% Spell Power] shadow damage and removes a random beneficial status from the target. If a status is removed, the target suffers an additional [~100% Spell Power] shadow damage.

title: Soul Link
description: All damage and healing dealt to one target is also dealt to the linked target.

title: Leech Intelligence
description: Damage caused steals [character level * 0.2] points of Intelligence. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Leech Might
description: Damage caused steals [character level * 0.2] points of Might. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Leech Dexterity
description: Damage caused steals [character level * 0.2] points of Dexterity. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Raise Skeletal Mage
description: Summon a skeletal mage to fight by your side.

title: Reaper's Scythe
description: Deals [~100% Spell Power] shadow damage for every 10% health missing from the target.

title: Soul Exchange
description: Swaps the life force of both you and a target, dealing [~100% Spell Power] shadow damage based on your missing health. Life Steals 100%.

title: Endless Night
description: Gain 2% of your maximum health as Additional Shadow Damage.

title: Child of the Abyss
description: Increases Max Health by 100%. Can no longer be healed by any means other than Life Steal.

title: Lich Lord
description: Removes the AP cost from all summoning skills.

title: Dagger Throw
description: Throw a dagger dealing [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Cripple
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Slow for 1 turn.

title: Escape
description: Teleport to the target area. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Poison Weapon
description: Attacks now apply 1 stack of Poisoned.

title: Death Dealer I
description: Increase Critical Hit Damage by 16%.

title: Swiftness
description: Increases your Movement Points by 1.

title: Ambush I
description: Deal 16% Increased Damage when an enemy has no allies within 3 hexes.

title: Fencer's Finesse I
description: Increases Dodge Chance by 5%.

title: Poisoned Dagger
description: Throw a poisoned dagger dealing [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 2 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Deadly Dagger
description: Throw a dagger dealing [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Deals 50% additional Critical Hit Damage.

title: Maim
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Disabled for 1 turn.

title: Gouge
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage.  Applies 2 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance against the next attack.

title: Hide In Shadows
description: Grants Stealth for 2 turns.

title: Death Dealer II
description: Increase Critical Hit Damage by an additional 24%.
notes: This bonus adds to Death Dealer I for a total of 40% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Shroud
description: Applies Stealth at the start of each battle.

title: Ambush II
description: Deal and additional 24% increased damage when an enemy has no allies within 3 hexes.
notes: This bonus adds to Ambush I for a total of 40% Increased Damage.

title: Fencer's Finesse II
description: Increases Dodge Chance by an additional 8%.
notes: This bonus adds to Fencer's Finesse I for a total of 13% Dodge Chance.

title: Garrote
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Disabled to the target for 1 turn and applies 3 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Steal Action
description: Steals the target's action granting 1 additional action this turn. Applies Disabled to the target for 1 turn. Applies Exhaustion.

title: Steal Status
description: Steals a random positive status from the target.

title: Uncanny Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance for the next attack. Increases Counter Attack Damage by 50% for 1 turn.

title: Enduring Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance against the next 2 attacks.

title: Hidden Blade
description: Increases Critical Hit Damage for your basic attack by 75%.

title: En Garde
description: Increases your maximum amount of Counter Attacks per turn by 2.

title: Fight Dirty
description: Your attacks apply 2 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Fade
description: Whenever an enemy dies, you have a 50% chance to gain Stealth for 1 turn.

title: Gore
description: Deals [~160% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Disabled for 1 turn.

title: Rupture
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Disabled for 1 turn and applies 6 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Shadow Walk
description: Teleport through the shadows. Applies Stealth for this turn. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Smoke Bomb
description: Increases Dodge Chance by 50% for all characters in smoke.

title: Master Assassin
description: Always deal the maximum damage within a damage range.

title: Contaminated Wound
description: Increases the duration of Poisoned and Bleeding effects you've applied by 2 turns.

title: Calculated Risk
description: When you are hit you have a 100% chance to cast Evasion.

title: Sleight of Hand
description: Steal all of the target's benificial statuses while giving the target all your negative statuses.

title: Deathblow
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Critical hits deal an additional 200% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Soft Step
description: Moving 5 hexes in a row grants you Stealth for your current turn. Your character no longer takes attacks of opportunity.
notes: This stealth fades as you end your turn. Movement does not have to be in a straight line.

title: Tricks of the Trade
description: Reduces the cooldown of all abilities by 1.
notes: This can not reduce a cooldown below 1 turn.

title: Incapacitate
description: Incapacitates the target applying Sleep for 2 turns.

title: Chi Strike
description: Strike an emery dealing [~120% Attack Power] weapon damage. Reduces the targets damage dealt by 20% for 1 turn.

title: Front Kick
description: Kicks the target dealing [~150% Attack Power] damage and knocks the target back 3 hexes. Any enemy hit also receives [~150% Attack Power] damage.

title: Momentum I
description: Each hex moved grants a stack of momentum, increasing the damage or healing of your next ability by 2%.

title: Contemplation I
description: Max Mana increased by 10%.

title: Masochism I
description: Gain a stack of Masochism each time you take damage. Each stack increases the damage/healing you deal by 2%. Lasts 1 turn.

title: Endurance I
description: Max Health increased by 10%.

title: Pain Suppression
description: The target's Damage Reduction is increased by 50% for 1 turn.

title: Focused Strike
description: Strike an enemy dealing [~140% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies a debuff that increases the damage this target takes from all sources for 2 turns by 20%.

title: Paralyzing Strike
description: Strike an enemy dealing [~140% Attack Power] weapon damage. Stuns the target for 1 turn.

title: Force Kick
description: Kicks the target dealing [~170% Attack Power] damage and kicking the target back up to 5 hexes. Any enemy hit by the target also receives [170% Attack Power] damage.

title: Stunning Kick
description: Kicks the target dealing [~150% Attack Power] damage and Stunning them for 1 turn.

title: Momentum II
description: Each hex moved grants a stack of Momentum increasing the damage or healing of your next ability by an additional 3%. Lasts 1 turn.

title: Contemplation II
description: Max Mana increased by an additional 15%.

title: Masochism II
description: Gain a stack of masochism each time you take damage. Each stack increases the damage and healing you deal by an additional 3%. Lasts 1 turn.

title: Endurance II
description: Max Health increased by an additional 15%.

title: Dashing Strikes
description: Dash to an enemy dealing [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage then quickly dash to an enemy within 2 hexes to strike again. Strikes up to 4 times.

title: Sweeping Kick
description: Deal [~160% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within 1 hex. Knocks back all enemies up to 3 hexes. Targets are Crippled for 1 turn.

title: Meditation
description: Put the target ally into a meditative state restoring 20% of max health and mana.

title: Falcon Dash
description: Dash to the target area and dealing [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage to affected area.

title: Combo Breaker
description: Basic attacks grant Combo Breaker. Combo Breaker gives your next non-basic attack ability 10% damage or healing per stack. Stacks are consumed on use.

title: Willpower
description: Every 10% of your max health you are missing increases damage reduction by 4%.

title: Weapon of Choice
description: 3% of your total attribute value is added to your character as Additional Weapon Damage.

title: Dodging Strikes
description: Dash to an enemy dealing [~180% Attack Power] weapon damage to an enemy then quickly dash to an enemy within 2 hexes to strike again. Strikes up to 4 times. Each time you strike a target it increases your dodge chance by 8%. Lasts 2 turns.

title: Power Strikes
description: Dash to an enemy dealing [~180% Attack Power] weapon damage then quickly dash to an enemy within 2 hexes to strike again. Strikes up to 4 times. Each time you hit increases the damage of power strikes by 50%.

title: Cyclone Kick
description: Deals [~160% Attack Power] damage. Pulls enemies within 3 hexes towards you. Targets are Crippled for 1 turn.

title: Soul Cleanse
description: Removes all negative status effects from target ally. Each status effect removed heals the target for 10% of their max health.

title: Strength
description: Increases Might and Vitality by 15%.

title: Speed
description: Increases Dexterity and Reflex by 15%.

title: Crash and Flow
description: Dodging an attack increases your damage dealt by 10%. Stacks 5. Lasts 1 turn.

title: Quaking Fist
description: Deals [~250% Attack Power] physical damage to all foes within 3 hexes.

title: Many Sided Strike
description: Hit enemies in the target area 5x randomly. Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage per hit.

title: Perfected Soul
description: Increase all attributes by [Character Level]. In addition, 10% of your highest attribute is added to all other attributes.

title: One Punch Monk
description: The first damaging or healing ability you use on your turn has its effectiveness tripled, after which you are unable to use any more damaging or healing abilities that turn.

title: Brambles
description: Summon brambles to block 4 hexes. Attackers will take physical damage when striking the brambles. Lasts 4 turns.

title: Faerie Swarm
description: Faeries swarm the target clawing and biting for [~40% Spell Power] physical damage and applying 1 stack of Bleeding each turn.

title: Entangle
description: Deals [~30% Spell Power] physical damage and applies Immobilized for 1 turn and 2 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Nature Summoning I
description: Summons a Raven, Coyote, or Raccoon to fight for you.

title: Pack Hunter I
description: For every ally within 1 hex of you gain 8% Increased Damage.

title: Adaptation I
description: Gain 6% resistance to the last type of damage taken.

title: Thorns I
description: Grants [2 - 24 based on character level] Return Physical Damage.

title: Beast Master I
description: Summons deal 10% more damage and have 10% more health.

title: Living Armor
description: Envelopes the target in living vines that increase Armor and Magic Armor by [4 - 105 based on character level] and causes the target to regenerate [7 - 64 Health based on character level] each turn.

title: Venomous Skin
description: Causes the skin of a target to secrete poison. Attacking enemies receive 3 stacks of Poisoned. Lasts 3 turns

title: The Bad Bloom
description: Creates a magic flower that applies 2 stacks of Poisoned per turn to enemies in range.

title: Pack Hunter II
description: For every ally within 1 hex of you gain 12% Increased Damage.

title: Adaptation II
description: Gain an additional 9% resistance to the last type of damage taken.

title: Thorns II
description: Grants an additional [1.8 - 36 based on character level] Return Physical Damage.

title: Beast Master II
description: Summons deal an additional 15% more damage and have an additional 15% more health.

title: Shapeshift Werewolf
description: Shapeshift into a Werewolf. Empowers your basic attack and gain new abilities. Increases Max Health by 10%.

title: The Good Bloom
description: Creates a magic blossom that regenerates [~25% Spell Power] Health and Mana per turn. This effect stacks.

title: Stun Spores
description: Infects enemies with stunning spores applying Stun for 1 turn.

title: Nature Summoning II
description: Summons a Stag, Wolf, or Boar to fight for you.

title: Bristles
description: Summons gain 50% of your return damage.

title: Contagion
description: Your poison damage spreads to enemy targets within 1 hex of the poisoned enemy.

title: Skin Walker
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shapeshifting skills by 1.

title: Mass Entangle
description: Deals [~60% Spell Power] physical damage and applies Immobilized for 1 turn and 3 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Rage Spores
description: Infects enemies and allies with Rage Spores that increase Damage Dealt and reduce Damage Reduction by 25% for 2 turns.

title: Sleep Spores
description: Infects enemies with Sleep Spores applying Sleep for 2 turns.

title: Rainstorm
description: Calls down a magical rain that increases potency of mana using abilities by 50% for all allies within the area. Lasts 2 turns

title: Circle of Life
description: When an enemy dies, you have a 50% chance to spawn a Good Bloom or Bad Bloom.

title: Natural Selection
description: When an Ally or Enemy dies gain 5% of your max Health and Mana.

title: Call of the Wild
description: Summoning skill cooldowns reduced by 1.

title: Shapeshift Dire Werewolf
description: Shapeshift into a Dire Werewolf. Empowers your basic attack and gain new abilities. Increases Max Health by 20%.

title: Titan Bloom
description: Creates a magic mushroom that increases Max Health and Damage of allies within its aura by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Shapeshift Dragonkin
description: Gain the ability to shapeshift into a powerful elemental Dragonkin. Empowers basic attack, grants new abilities, and resistance based on the color you choose. Increases Armor by [9 - 12 to 255 - 345 based on character level].

title: Mind Blossom
description: Charm the enemy target for 1 turn. Cannot target bosses.

title: Nature Summoning III
description: Summons a Bear, Moose, or Panther to fight for you.

title: Ecosystem
description: Every summon active increases the Max Life, Damage and Healing of you and your summons by 5%.

title: Evolution
description: Getting hit increases max health by 5% stacking 10x. Hitting increases damage by 5% stacking 10x. Only one of the buffs can be active at a time.
